ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql: select sum((`sub`.`analysis_wait_flg` = 1)) AS `解析_解析待ち件数`,sum((`sub`.`analysis_pending_flg` = 1)) AS `解析_解析保留件数`,sum((`sub`.`office_work_flg` = 1)) AS `解析_業務対応中件数`,sum((`sub`.`analysis_complete_wait_flg` = 1)) AS `解析_完了待ち件数` from (`t_object_analysis` `main` join `m_analysis_status` `sub` on((`main`.`analysis_status_id` = `sub`.`analysis_status_id`))) where (exists(select `t_object_order`.`object_order_id` from `t_object_order` where ((`t_object_order`.`object_order_id` = `main`.`object_order_id`) and (`t_object_order`.`active_flg` = 1))) and ((`sub`.`analysis_wait_flg` = 1) or (`sub`.`analysis_pending_flg` = 1) or (`sub`.`office_work_flg` = 1) or (`sub`.`analysis_complete_wait_flg` = 1)))
